alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:58PM CDT until August 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RAWLINS...NORTHWESTERN DECATUR...RED WILLOW AND EASTERN HITCHCOCK COUNTIES... At 858 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Culbertson to 4 miles northeast of Ludell, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McCook, Herndon, Indianola, Oberlin and Danbury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
